title: #812: The Random Show — New Health Gadgets, Tim’s Latest Adventures, How to Drink Less, Zen Retreats, AI + Your Genome, and Colonoscopy Confessions
description: Welcome to another wide-ranging "Random Show" episode I recorded with my close friend Kevin Rose (digg.com)!
